title: Exploring JavaScript Logical OR Operator
description: In this lab, we will explore the logical or (||) operator in JavaScript. The purpose of this lab is to understand how the logical or operator works and how it can be used to check if at least one of the given arguments is true. Through practical examples, we will learn how to implement the logical or operator in our code.

meta.title: Exploring JavaScript Logical OR Operator
meta.description: Learn how to use the logical OR operator in JavaScript through practical examples.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, logical or operator, coding, javascript lab, tutorial, javascript tutor, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
